SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_IMPORT_GETIMPORTSOURCE
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to get the Default Import Source
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_IMPORT_GETIMPORTSOURCE ( @importSourceName nvarchar(100), @userName nvarchar(100) = '' output, @password nvarchar(100) = '' output )
as begin --declare @importSourceName nvarchar(100) = 'Default Network Import Path' -- changed to parm so that it can be specified by the caller. exec dbo.USP_GET_KEY_ACCESS
begin try select top 1 @userName = USERNAME, @password = convert(nvarchar(100), DecryptByKey(PASSWORD)) from dbo.importsource where lower(NAME) = lower (@importSourceName) close symmetric key sym_BBInfinity end try begin catch close symmetric key sym_BBInfinity end catch
end
